TransactionStateContext.WagerState: When users place a bet using the wager function, their balance and timestamp are updated.
TransactionStateContext.PlayState: When users play by invoking the play function, determining if they win or lose based on randomness and difficulty.

ExternalInteractions.WagerPlacement: Transfers ETH from users to the contract when wagers are placed.
ExternalInteractions.DonationToWhale: Transfers ETH to the 'whale' address via an unchecked call in donateToWhale and loseWager functions.
